name: Retrieve the Relationship Management Details for Other Customer with no RM

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930000125000"

When I Retrieve the Relationship Management Details for CIF Key: <cifKey>
| cifKey | notes |
| 0100000930000125000 | Other Customer with no RM |

Then the following data Relationship Management Information should be returned
| relationshipManager | rmStaffID | treatmentFlag | rmEmail | rmPhone | lifetimeValue | marketSegment | treatmentStrategy | mgmtLocation |
|  | 99978 |  |  | (1890) 724724 |  | D | Personal Classic |  |

children.description: Validate response: | relationshipManager | rmStaffID | treatmentFlag | rmEmail | rmPhone | lifetimeValue | marketSegment | treatmentStrategy | mgmtLocation | | | 99978 | | | (1890) 724724 | | D | Personal Classic | |
